
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,tx,ty,x,y;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x>>y>>tx>>ty;
        if((((x%tx) == 0) && ((y %ty)==0))  || (((x%ty) == 0) && ((y %tx)==0)) )
        cout<<"yes"<<endl;
        else
        cout<<"no"<<endl;
    }
        return 0;
}
